name: You shall not password!
description:
You shall not password!

You will have to use strong passwords to last longer in this bullet hell rhythm game and, in the end, defeat the cracker. 

After choosing your four passwords, dodge the cracker's attacks and write your passwords continuously so that the attacker has to start again to crack your current password.  The attacker will send you bullets. Dodge them, otherwise, you'll have to start typing your password all over again.

Developed by lordebasta. Music is Jetski by octilary.
